commit.message:
rs6000.c (TARGET_DELEGITIMIZE_ADDRESS): Redefine.

	* config/rs6000/rs6000.c (TARGET_DELEGITIMIZE_ADDRESS): Redefine.
	(rs6000_delegitimize_address): New function.

files.patch:
